website_summaries.verdict: A solidly built riding lawn mower replacement battery that is best suited for John Deere models.
pros: This replacement battery features a convenient built-in handle that makes both transport and installation easier
The spill-proof case is manufactured to be resistant to vibrations, and it has been carefully sized to have a better fit than the original battery
cons: It is important to keep this battery properly charged or it won't last as long as it should

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I will have to update my review as ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I will have to update my review as time goes by. It is slightly bigger than the factory battery that came with my John Deere D110 but fits perfectly. It fits better than the factory battery with no wiggle room. I've got a battery maintainer (for the winter time) hooked up to it so hopefully it lasts much longer than the factory one did (< 3 years). If this battery exceeds 3 years - I'll be very happy and will order again. # Pros - Price is right. - Bigger capacity compared to the factory (15Ah). - Fits better than factory battery. - Handle makes it easier to move around. # Cons - None
customer_reviews.author: JPTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in April and bulging and dead in September
customer_reviews.text: Terrible customer service on a defective product. So I writting a negative review.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mangine

customer_reviews.title: Charged up just fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Hustler Raptor. The original battery died after 3 years. It was 15 A/H and did fine until one day it stopped charging. This one fit the space perfectly and installed with no difficulty whatsoever... turned the motor over much faster than the old battery ever did. Mower had been sitting with the dead battery quite a few months, so it took a while to get happy enough to start, but once it had cleaned itself out, no problems after that. I put the trickle charger on it to keep it happy and I also am quite happy with this battery. We will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Condor

customer_reviews.title: Great battery. Replaced my 2 year old Deere battery ...
customer_reviews.text: Great battery. Replaced my 2 year old Deere battery with this one at half the cost. Starts on a dime. So far no complaints only praise. Paid $123 bucks for the Deere battery which lasted maybe 2 years. This one at half the cost appears far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Dead in Less than 12 Months
customer_reviews.text: After getting tired of replacing the cheap lead acid batteries from big box stores, thought I'd end that issue by getting an AGM battery for the lawn tractor. Installed in March of 2018 and worked fine over the summer and fall. Disconnected for the winter and removed. The following spring, it was dead and wouldn't hold a charge. Back to cheap lead acid at half the price as this AGM is twice as expensive and doesn't last any longer then the cheapies.
customer_reviews.author: Millard

customer_reviews.title: "Life is like a box of chocolates; you never know what you will get."
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bought this battery for my mower. The first one lasted almost 4 years. This one lasted 2 weeks shy of its one year warranty. What do you do with a warranty like that? You can't send it back or get a pro-rated refund. It is a hit or miss proposition whether the battery will last beyond one year. I have lost confidence in this type of battery. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Fit my John Deere X304 like stock. Lawn tractor fires right up
customer_reviews.text: Fit my John Deere X304 like stock. Lawn tractor fires right up. Stock battery lasted over 4 years, hope this one does the same. Keeping it charged up during non-grass cutting season helps.
customer_reviews.author: Old-Duckman

customer_reviews.title: Blemish
customer_reviews.text: The battery arrived well packaged but one post had been smashed. I Used a drill bit to open the hole on that post so I could insert the bolt. This could have been a "blem" or second. When installed it was charged and worked fine. Of course I was expecting a battery without a smashed post.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt Cop

customer_reviews.title: This battery worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This battery worked like a charm. For the price it does the trick. I’ve had it on the mower for a month without any issues. Don’t waste your money on other official John Deere batteries. This does the same exact thing
customer_reviews.author: Kay Fury

customer_reviews.title: Didn't think I could go wrong with the amount of positive reviews but sure enough...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think I could go wrong with the amount of positive reviews but sure enough about 4 months after purchasing the battery is dead. I couldn't believe it until I re-read the reviews and saw others saying the same thing. Also, you can't return batteries on Amazon so I'll have to go somewhere locally to purchase and accept that I lost $85...for a door stop.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2+ months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less than three months. Didn’t want to jump thru hoops for replacement so I bought one from Lowe’s.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M. Strope

customer_reviews.title: Meets all expectations
customer_reviews.text: Battery came quickly and was fully charged and started the tractor up first crank. Easy fit for my John Deere with post connections made right for the connections on the cables.
customer_reviews.author: J. T. Pilonero

customer_reviews.title: Hope it's cold resistant!
customer_reviews.text: Starts the mower like it was intended to do. Wish I had a warm place to store the mower so the battery would last longer - but when I put the snowblower on it has to be ready to go in the cold. We'll hope it lasts a few years even in the cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J.

customer_reviews.title: You will be happy you got this battery.
customer_reviews.text: These campact little batteries are awesome. I have purchased three. They are great for my mower, my boat.and as a reserve battery. Non spilliable
customer_reviews.author: Dale Walker

customer_reviews.title: That the product is built with what appears to be good quality parts.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described. It’s great quality and it seems to have better starting power than the original battery. I’d recommend it not to mention who else can beat these amazon prices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Designed to carry with one hand.
customer_reviews.text: Received the battery one day early. Great job! The battery has a handle making it easy to carry with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Stan555

customer_reviews.title: Good battery.
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but I just got it so I can’t say anything about long term performance. I will update after I use it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery, Quick Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, fired my riding mower right up. Seems to be a very good value for the money. If it lasts it will be great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Collin A. McIver

customer_reviews.title: Fits Husqvarna YTH 24V48 perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Battery came fully charged and is a perfect replacement for the Husqvarna YTH 24V48. Time will tell on it's longevity. Delivery was less than half a week to me. Price (compared) is very good at well. Worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: GB-NY

customer_reviews.title: lawn mower batteries
customer_reviews.text: Good price, great quality, fast service, and highly recommend to other buyers. A lot better battery than sold locally.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a Toro timecutter zero turn. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Toro timecutter zero turn. I have same the battery, different size, in an atv. These batteries hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: stonedci

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly in my John Deere D110
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. I put it in and the tractor stared right up. I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JABischoff

customer_reviews.title: New battery for my Toro Zero Turn tractor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery. I bought this as a replacement for one I bought 2 yrs. ago. This one is significantly heavier thus I believe more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Dwfreidell

customer_reviews.title: Great John Deere replacement battery
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Been using it weekly for a few months with no issues in NY John Deere D160. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Works in John Deere LA 105 mower
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement batttery for a 10-year old John Deere Rider Mower.
customer_reviews.author: finkey

customer_reviews.title: It died after a few months, tried to jump ...
customer_reviews.text: It died after a few months, tried to jump it with my car’s battery, but it just won’t hold a charge!
customer_reviews.author: HERBERT HAUSZAR

customer_reviews.title: Fit right in my 1964 International harvester garden tractor. ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit right in my 1964 International harvester garden tractor . Will be plowing soon Im sure. Will keep it on a trickle charger when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Philip Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Batteries came ready for installation
customer_reviews.text: Fully charged and ready to go fit perfect. Now that was a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Great power
customer_reviews.text: Battery works perfectly. Needed it for my riding lawn mower
customer_reviews.author: Roger Long

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2013 John Deere 300 perfectly. Cranked it quickly. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Scott D.

customer_reviews.title: The battery is OK, but a post was bent ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery is OK, but a post was bent over! I had to straighten it out so I could hook it up to the mower. It seems to have plenty of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a Craftsman riding mower. Was surprised it was a perfect fit! No more spending 20 minutes waiting for the old one to charge up enough to start the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Hill Creations

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my John Deere LA 150 mower . It has plenty of cranking power .
customer_reviews.author: arrow_head27330@yahoo.comAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: This product only functioned for 3 1/2 months and then swelled up. Have contacted for warranty information.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product I have to charge it every day . Even if I don’t used it
customer_reviews.author: All in one

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using it on the mower. Will see how it holds up. Cant beat the prices.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This battery was perfect for my mower. It is working well and holds the charge well.
customer_reviews.author: kataleen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good small battery for any lawn tractor with fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: David Long

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great battery for my lawn tractor. No spills over rough terrain and has excellent starting power.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for my Model 425 JD tractor battery
customer_reviews.text: I was referred to this battery model by a John Deere site but is was $10 more. The battery arrived sooner than expected and dropped right into my 425 tractor. If you have a charger it would be good to give the battery a boost after installing since it is not 100% charged out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Beeler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great started tractor as soon as it was installed
customer_reviews.author: Jade Fibish

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to( + )and( - )terminal location.
customer_reviews.text: The positive and negative terminals were on opposite sides of the original battery. Fortunately the wires just made it with very little play. Otherwise time will tell. So far the battery is fine when it comes to starting. Holding a charge well so far. Ask me again in another year lol.
customer_reviews.author: Evangelos Pikoulas

customer_reviews.title: Not a universal fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have a John Deere riding lawn mower & needed a replacement battery. The description indicated it universally fits John Deere mowers. It doesn't! It's 1/8" too long. However the return service was fabulous and they sent me a returns shipping label.
customer_reviews.author: Zamp

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of time and money due to the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: This battery was supposed to be "Universal" and it indicated it would fit my model of John Deere lawn tractor, however it is much too big to fit in the battery compartment. The battery is basically worthless to me. Complete waste of time and money due to the fact that the company sold it as fitting models in which it will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Glotzbach

product_meta.title: Universal Power Group 12V 35AH Battery for John Deere Lawn Garden Tractor Riding Mower SLA
product_meta.description: D5722 UB12350 12V 35Ah - absorbent Glass Mat (AGM) technology for superior performance. Valve regulated, spill proof construction allows safe operation in any position.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 7.75 inches x 5.19 inches x 7.13 inches. Weight: 22.50 lbs
Sla/agm maintenance free, spill proof battery
Rechargeable battery that can be mounted in any position, resists shocks and vibration

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars135 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
